= Dell XPS 13 9315 =

See also 

== Firmware upgrades ==

Note that this device is supported by [https://fwupd.org/ fwupd].
To perform firmware upgrades just activate the service

<code>
services.fwupd.enable = true;
</code>

Then use <code>fwupdmgr</code> to perform updates.
